description: Stores authorization information for a charge transaction.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OVRD_AUTH_CVG_ID
columns.description: Lists all the coverages on the guarantor account for this transaction.

columns.name: OVRD_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Stores the authorization number received from payor. This item is never automatically populated by the system. Users have to manually enter.

columns.name: AUTH_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The authorization source type category ID of the authorization source for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


System


Charge Router Handler

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: List of linked Authorization records based on coverages.

columns.name: AUTH_OVRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: This stores the user that was responsible for the last authorization assignment.

columns.name: AUTH_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: This stores the last time an authorization was assigned.

columns.name: INCL_IN_AUTH_CHG_CNT_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the charge contributes to the used count of the authorization linked to it.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
